quotes.quote: Sometimes I’ll start a sentence and I don’t even know where it’s going. I just hope I find it along the way.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I never thought I’d say this, but I think I ate too much bone marrow.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: Everything I have I owe to this job…this stupid, wonderful, boring, amazing job.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: And I feel God in this Chili’s tonight.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: I normally don’t enjoy making people laugh.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: I talk a lot, so I’ve learned to tune myself out.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: The Dunder Mifflin stock symbol is D.M.I. Do you know what that stands for? Dummies, Morons, and Idiots. Because that’s what you’d have to be to own it. And as one of those idiots, I believe the board owes me answers.
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: Me think, why waste time say lot word, when few word do trick.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: I’m glad Michael’s getting help. He has a lot of issues, and he’s stupid.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: It’s true. Around this office in the past, I have been a little abrupt with people. But the doctor said, if I can’t find a new way to relate more positively to my surroundings, I’m going to die.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: I wanna do a cartwheel. But real casual-like. Not enough to make a big deal out of it, but I know everyone saw it. One stunning, gorgeous cartwheel.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: A few years ago, my family was on a safari in Africa and my cousin, Mufasa, was um, he was trampled to death by a pack of wildebeests and um, we all took it really hard.
quotes.author: Ryan Howard

quotes.quote: No, I’m not going to tell them about the downsizing. If a patient has cancer, you don’t tell them.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Dwight mercy-killed Angela’s cat.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: I’m not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Sometimes the clothes at Gap Kids are just too flashy.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: Look, it doesn’t take a genius to know that every organization thrives when it has two leaders. Go ahead, name a country that doesn’t have two presidents. A boat that sets sail without two captains. Where would Catholicism be without the popes?
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: An office is for not dying. An office is a place to live life to the fullest, to the max, to… An office is a place where dreams come true.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I run a small fake-ID company from my car with a laminating machine that I swiped from the Sheriff’s station.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: I got six numbers, one more and it would have been a complete phone number.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: The man is wearing sandals. I don’t need to see Oscar’s toes at work. Gross! I mean he looks like he just got off the boat.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: So this is my life. Until I win the lottery. Or Pam finally writes that series of young adult books.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: If I don’t have some cake soon, I might die.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: Guess what, I have flaws. What are they? Oh, I don’t know. I sing in the shower. Sometimes I spend too much time volunteering. Occasionally I’ll hit somebody with my car. So sue me.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Well, this is what happened. Uh, Ryan’s big project was the website. Which wasn’t doing so well. So Ryan, to give the impression of sales, recorded them twice. Once as offices and once in the website sales, which is what we refer to in the business as misleading the shareholders. Another good term is fraud. The real crime, I think, was the beard.
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: The worst thing about prison was the dementors.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: Oh, I don’t think it’s blackmail. Angela just does what I ask her to do so I won’t tell everyone that she’s cheating on Andy with Dwight. I think for it to be blackmail, it would have to be a formal letter.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: You know what they say about a car wreck, where it’s so awful you can’t look away? The Dundies are like a car wreck that you want to look away from but you have to stare at it because your boss is making you.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: Do I need to be liked? Absolutely not. I like to be liked. I enjoy being liked. I have to be liked, but it’s not like this compulsive need to be liked, like my need to be praised.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I am proud to announce that there is a new addition to the Martin family. She’s hypoallergenic. She doesn’t struggle when you try to dress her. She’s a third-generation show cat. Her father was in ‘Meet the Parents.’ Needless to say, she was very, very expensive.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: I don’t talk trash, I talk smack. They’re totally different. Trash talk is hypothetical, like: Your mom is so fat she can eat the internet. But smack talk is happening like right now. Like: You’re ugly and I know it for a fact ’cause I got the evidence right there.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: I don’t care what they say about me. I just want to eat. Which I realize is a lot to ask for. At a dinner party.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: Life is short. Drive fast and leave a sexy corpse. That’s one of my mottos.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I just want to lie on the beach and eat hot dogs. That’s all I’ve ever wanted.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: Powerpoints are the peacocks of the business world; all show, no meat.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: My roommate wants to meet everybody. Because I’m pretty sure he thinks I’m making Dwight up. He is very real.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: No, Rose, they are not breathing. And they have no arms or legs … Where are they? You know what? If we come across somebody with no arms or legs, do we bother resuscitating them? I mean, what quality of life do we have there?
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I wonder what people like about me. Probably my jugs.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: Oh, you’re paying way too much for worms. Who’s your worm guy?
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: Look, I know the reason that you guys became accountants is ’cause you’re not good at interacting with people. But guess what? From now on, you guys are no longer losers. So gives yourselves a round of applause.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: Fool me once, strike one. Fool me twice, strike three.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Sometimes the clothes at Gap Kids are too flashy, so I’m forced to go to the American Girl store and order clothes for large colonial dolls.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: Today, smoking is going to save lives.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: I don’t want to be married in a tent like a hobo.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: It is not a good time for me to lose my job since I have some pretty big long-term plans in my personal life with Pam that I’d like her parents to be psyched about. So, I am about to do something very bold in this job that I’ve never done before: try.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: I have been trying to get on jury duty every year since I was 18 years old. To get to go sit it in an air-conditioned room, downtown, judging people, while my lunch is paid for … that is the life.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: The only problem is whenever I try to make a taco, I get too excited and crush it.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: How is it possible that in five years, I’ve had two engagements and only one chair?
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: Yeah, I’m not a temp anymore. I got Jim’s old job. Which means at my ten-year high school reunion, it will not say “Ryan Howard is a temp”. It will say “Ryan Howard is a junior sales associate at a mid-range paper supply firm”… That’ll show ’em.
quotes.author: Ryan Howard

quotes.quote: I guess I’ve been working so hard, I forgot what it’s like to be hardly working.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Who says exactly what they’re thinking? What kind of a game is that?
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: I’ve been involved in a number of cults, both a leader and a follower. You have more fun as a follower, but you make more money as a leader.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: Yes, I have a dream, and it’s not some MLK dream for equality. I want to own a decommissioned lighthouse. And I want to live at the top. And nobody knows I live there. And there’s a button that I can press, and launch that lighthouse into space.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: I’m guessing Angela is the one in the neighborhood that gives the trick-or-treaters toothbrushes. Pennies. Walnuts.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: I am running away from my responsibilities. And it feels good.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I once reported Oscar to the INS. Turns out he’s clean, but I’m glad I did it.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: Besides having sex with men, I would say the Finer Things Club is the gayest thing about me.
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: If I were buying my coffin, I would get one with thicker walls so you couldn’t hear the other dead people.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: We have a gym at home. It’s called the bedroom.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: If I had to, I could clean out my desk in five seconds, and nobody would ever know that I’d ever been here. And I’d forget, too.
quotes.author: Ryan Howard

quotes.quote: I don’t hate it. I just don’t like it at all and it’s terrible.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: You guys I’m, like, really smart now. You don’t even know. You could ask me,’ Kelly, what’s the biggest company in the world?’ And I’d be like, ‘blah blah blah, blah blah blah blah blah blah.’ Giving you the exact right answer.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: I am a black belt in gift wrapping.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: The people here are amazing debaters. I guess you can say they are master-baters.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: Who is Justice Beaver?
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: I want you to rub butter on my foot…Pam, please? I have Country Crock.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Newsflash: You are not special.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: When you’re a kid, you assume your parents are soulmates. My kids are going to be right about that.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: And I knew exactly what to do. But in a much more real sense, I had no idea what to do.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I miss the days when there was only one party I didn’t want to go to.
quotes.author: Ryan Howard

quotes.quote: Sometimes I get so bored I just want to scream, and then sometimes I actually do scream. I just sort of feel out what the situation calls for.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: I am Beyonce, always.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I find the mystery genre disgusting. I hate being titillated.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: If I can’t scuba, then what’s this all been about? What am I working toward?
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: I say dance, they say ‘How high?'
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I wanted to eat a pig in a blanket, in a blanket.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: As a person who buys a lot of erotic cakes, it’s nice to be represented on one.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: Jim told me you could buy gay-dar online.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: I do not like pregnant women in my workspace. They’re always complaining. I have varicose veins, too. I have swollen ankles. I’m constantly hungry. Do you think my nipples don’t get sore too? Do you think I don’t need to know the fastest way to the hospital?
quotes.author: Standley Hudson

quotes.quote: I hate the idea that someone out there hates me. I even hate thinking that Al-Qaeda hates me. I think if they got to know me, they wouldn’t hate me.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: Tell him to call me ASAP as possible.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I do not apologize unless I think I’m wrong, and if you don’t like it, you can leave.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: Stanley just drank OJ out of my mug and didn’t seem to realize that it wasn’t his hot coffee. So the question has to be asked, is there no limit to what he won’t notice?
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: Ultimatums are key. Basically, nobody does anything for me anymore unless I threaten to kill myself.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: I love inside jokes. I’d love to be a part of one someday.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I want to be wine and dined and sixty-nined.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: Last year, Creed asked me how to set up a blog. Wanting to protect the world from being exposed to Creed’s brain, I opened up a Word document on his computer and put an address at the top. I’ve read some of it. Even for the Internet, it’s… pretty shocking.
quotes.author: Ryan Howard

quotes.quote: I already won the lottery. I was born in the US of A baby. And as backup, I have a Swiss passport.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple. You have to respect it. You can’t just whore it out.
quotes.author: Angela Martin

quotes.quote: I have decided that I’m going to be more honest. I’m gonna start telling people what I want, directly. So, look out world, ‘cuz ‘ol Pammy is gettin’ what she wants. And, don’t call me Pammy.
quotes.author: Pam Beesley

quotes.quote: It’s like I used to tell my wife. I do not apologize unless I think I’m wrong, and if you don’t like it, you can leave. And I say the same thing to my current wife, and I’ll say it to my next one, too.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: I would say I kind of have an unfair advantage, because I watch reality dating shows like a hawk, and I learn. I absorb information from the strategies of the winners and the losers. Actually, I probably learn more from the losers.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I mean, I’m not a slut but who knows.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: Michael is leaving. And apparently, they’ve already hired a new manager. And we’re meeting him today. It’s a lot to process. Paperwork-wise.
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: Close your mouth, sweetie. You look like a trout.
quotes.author: Phyllis Lapin-Vance

quotes.quote: I wake up every morning in a bed that’s too small, drive my daughter to a school that’s too expensive, and then I go to work to a job for which I get paid too little. But on pretzel day? Well, I like pretzel day.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: Nobody steals from Creed Bratton and gets away with it. The last person to do this disappeared. His name? Creed Bratton.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: Any man who says he totally understands women is a fool. Because they are un-understandable.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: There’s a lot of beauty in ordinary things. Isn’t that kind of the point?
quotes.author: Pam Beesly

quotes.quote: I’ve got a golden-ticket idea. Why don’t you skip on up to the roof and jump off?
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: I’m fast. To give you a reference point. I’m somewhere between a snake and a mongoose. And a panther.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: There are always a million reasons not to do something.
quotes.author: Jan Levinson

quotes.quote: It’s a real shame because studies have shown that more information gets passed through water cooler gossip than through official memos. Which puts me at a disadvantage because I bring my own water to work.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: Creed Bratton has never declared bankruptcy. When Creed Bratton gets in trouble, he transfers his debt to William Charles Scheider.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: When Pam gets Michael’s old chair, I get Pam’s old chair. Then I’ll have two chairs. Only one to go.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.quote: We didn’t play many video games in Scranton. Instead we’d do stuff like… uh, Pam and I would sometimes hum the same high-pitched note and try to get Dwight to make an appointment with an ear doctor. And, uh, Pam called it… Pretendinitis.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: This is an environment of welcoming, and you should just get the hell out of here.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I’m always thinking one step ahead, like a carpenter that makes stairs.
quotes.author: Andy Bernard

quotes.quote: I am about to do something very bold in this job that I’ve never done before: try.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: Right now, this is just a job. If I advance any higher in this company, this would be my career. And, uh, if this were my career, I’d have to throw myself in front of a train.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: I kinda know what it’s like to be in commercials. My nickname in high school used to be Kool-Aid Man.
quotes.author: Kevin Malone

quotes.quote: Boy, have you done lost your mind? Cause I’ll help you find it!
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: Today, smoking is going to save lives.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: Oh God, my mind is going a mile an hour.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I live by one rule: No office romances, no way. Very messy, inappropriate… no. But, I live by another rule: Just do it… Nike.
quotes.author: Michael Scott
